sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' type Props = { name: string, types: string[], number_of_reviews: number, rating: number, imgURL?: string, titleSize?: string, titleColor?: string } //An exapmle of style using object (for more readable code) const cardStyle: React.CSSProperties = { boxShadow: '0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.2)', transition: '0.3s', width: '25em', marginRight: '2em', marginBottom: '2em', minHeight: '42em', padding:'2em' } const AttractionCard = ({ name, rating, number_of_reviews, types, imgURL, titleColor, titleSize }: Props) => { return <>

{name}

Rating: {rating} | {number_of_reviews} Reviews

{types.join(', ')}

} export default AttractionCard
